nodes.text: Carlon Brandes was a Human male who served as a corporal in the Royal Naboo Security Forces around the time of the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY. He shared his surname with Hela Brandes, who served as the Music Advisor sitting on the Royal Advisory Council during the first term of Queen Padmé Amidala's reign.

Brandes was first identified in Rogues Gallery: Naboo's Finest!, an article written by Tim Veekhoven, Kevin Beentjes and Sander de Lange for the 145th issue of the Star Wars Insider magazine. The character was given the surname Brandes to establish a link with Hela Brandes, a background character from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. More specifically, Veekhoven, Beentjes and de Lange intended Carlon to be Hela's son.
